name: Erics Quest For His Cat Mini Demo!
name_original: Erics Quest For His Cat Mini Demo!
description:
THIS IS NOT THE OFFICAL DEMO!!!!!!!

THIS IS A MINI DEMO SHOWING ALL OF MY WORK FROM JUST A COUPLE MONTHS OF WORK, AN OFFICIAL DEMO WILL BE COMING AT THE END OF DEVELOPMENT!!!

If I'm being honest, I don't really like this demo that I made, probably because I only had one day to make it. That being said, I will still accept all criticisms and act on them because this is a true representation of the state of the game currently, because I honestly didn't have time to fix anything.

A donation before downloading would be greatly appreciated, seeing as I current don't have much funding for this game, and even a single dollar could change everything.

Have fun!
